alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 2:48AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF RIPLEY COUNTY THROUGH 315 AM EDT... At 248 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Vernon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Versailles, Milan, Osgood, Sunman, Holton, Napoleon, Rexville, Benham, Penntown, New Marion, Friendship, Versailles Lake, Cross Plains, Otter Village and Olean. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
